mapper.insert: insert into itda_web.crawling_mst (id, title, url, active_yn, error_yn, loc_code, created_at, last_crawling_dt, remark) values ((select coalesce(max(id)+1,1) from itda_web.crawling_mst), #{title}, #{url}, #{activeYn}, #{errorYn}, #{locCode}, NOW(), NOW(), '-') ON CONFLICT(title) DO UPDATE set url = #{url}, loc_code = #{locCode}, active_yn = #{activeYn}, error_yn = #{errorYn}, last_crawling_dt = NOW()
mapper.update: update itda_app.crawling_data set si_title = replace(si_title, si_title, ltrim(si_title, 'New')) where to_char(si_cret_dt, 'YYYY-MM-dd') = to_char(NOW(), 'YYYY-MM-dd') and si_title like 'New%'
update itda_app.crawling_data set si_title = replace(si_title, si_title, rtrim(si_title, 'NEW')) where to_char(si_cret_dt, 'YYYY-MM-dd') = to_char(NOW(), 'YYYY-MM-dd') and si_title like '%NEW'
update itda_app.crawling_data set si_title = ltrim(regexp_replace(si_title, '\<[^)]+\>' ,'')) where target_name != '서울청년정책'
